data.text:
Sometimes you can find the world's most majestic art right outside your window! 🎨

📸: expeditionvibes https://t.co/NMWrOBZYdL

@melide7 @melide7 I'm sorry to hear you were disappointed. While we don't currently block seats, we do enable those who are concerned about traveling on fuller flights to sign up to be notified if their flight's capacity exceeds 65%. Feel free to contact us with any questions. - SG

@Kendall1810 @Kendall1810 Hi Kendall! At this time, we do not have extra storage space or garment closets to accommodate suits or dresses. Any item such as a dress brought on board would be considered a carry-on and would have to fit in the overhead bin. - C

@mopar_fam @mopar_fam Hi Jerry. We are sorry to hear that you had a negative experience with our representatives. If you are in need of assistance or wish to discuss this in detail, please send us a DM: https://t.co/1bdtPMQWFt and we will be happy to help you. - Charles

@JoeSkilliams @JoeSkilliams Hi Joe! Thanks so much for the shout out. We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us and we appreciate you recognizing our efforts. Here's to many more flights to come! - C
#togetherwefly

@Dsheldongauci @Dsheldongauci Hi Deborah! We're disappointed to hear about this. All of our team members are expected to be professional and assist however they can. If you need assistance, please send us a DM with your reservation details and the specifics of your request.- C

Make sure there are no surprises on your next trip! Health and safety regulations vary by state and region, so always check local guidelines before you travel! #KnowBeforeYouGo

📸: jacksons_aviation https://t.co/LiLhMVnTYk

@mopar_fam @mopar_fam Hi Jerry. Allegiant prides itself in hiring and serving a diverse group of people. Our policy prohibits discrimination to anyone, colleagues or customers, on any basis. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/Sh0LAW7G8m so that we can investigate this situation. - Charles

urls.title: Log in to Twitter / Twitter
urls.description: Log in to Twitter to see the latest. Join the conversation, follow accounts, see your Home Timeline, and catch up on Tweets from the people you know.

data.text: @_Vampire_Slayer @_Vampire_Slayer Hello Buffy. We are so sorry to hear that you are experiencing a disruption in your service. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/2Z9xKRGqCt  w/ your reservation details and the specifics of your request. - Charles

Cleared for takeoff. 👌

📸: valleyplanespotting https://t.co/NLil1Tp233

@howmuch4theox @mollympls11 @howmuch4theox Hi Granny--we certainly understand that traveling right now is a personal choice that is determined by many factors. Please send us a private message so one of our team members can review the options that are available to you! - SG
@KnuppelRodney @KnuppelRodney We do, too! 👏👏
@mmbenidt @mmbenidt Not a bad idea! Thanks for the suggestion! - SG
@Janellcp @Janellcp We're happy to help! Please send us a private message with your sister's itinerary information so we can take a look. - SG

@JoeSkilliams @JoeSkilliams I'm sorry to hear that your boarding was delayed, Joe. While we understand the importance of getting you to your destination on time, we would never sacrifice safety to meet an on-time departure or arrival. - SG

@O2BTheLorax @O2BTheLorax I'm sorry to hear about your experience, Elizabeth. There are several things you mentioned that do not comply with our face covering policy. Please send us a private message so we can get more information so our teams can review. Thank you! - SG
Dear Trenton, Thanks for taking the time to write us such an awesome letter! We're looking forward to taking you back to see your aunt sometime soon. Sincerely, Team Allegiant https://t.co/Ww3GoV10OU

@RecklessBoxcar @RecklessBoxcar Hello Michael. We are extremely disappointed to hear about this. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/sRAhWFBnSc with your reservation details so that we may investigate this incident. - Charles

Hello world. 👋
📷: @Raiders https://t.co/fZz9SQFntT

@mke12009 @mke12009 Thank you for your support! But that is not accurate. All customers are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times when traveling to help protect them and those around them. Learn more here: https://t.co/WsPO3wcykC - Charles

@mikemetz112 @mikemetz112 Hi Mike! The option to opt-in for notification when and if your flight is booked over 65% capacity should be listed at the top of your confirmation email. If you need further assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/0fN2lNas5F - Charles

data.text: Only at @AllegiantStadm. #GameDay https://t.co/tPdGGDGhO5

@HollywoodErika1 @HollywoodErika1 Hi Erica--we have a couple of flights in September, and then the route will go on a brief hiatus until late November. Please let us know if you have any additional questions! - SG

@timshannon_iowa @timshannon_iowa Hi Tim! Thanks for reaching out. If you seeking assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/2p2U9SphjN with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. We will be happy to help you. - Charles

@mollympls11 @mollympls11 Hi Molly! Thanks for reaching out. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/PUyOGNDQcR with your voucher information so that we may review your options with you. - Charles

@Mormon4Trump @Mormon4Trump All customers 2 yrs of age and older are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times when traveling to help protect them and those around them. If you experienced an issue and are seeking assistance, please send us a DM. - Charles

@thediaryof17 @thediaryof17 Thank you for your kind words and recognition! 💙🧡✈ - Charles
#togetherwefly

data.text: @cjmartinez @cjmartinez If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/TabjJAgslo  with your reservation information and the specifics of your request. For your privacy, I strongly recommend that you delete this Tweet containing your confirmation number. - Charles

@louiepapa407 @louiepapa407 Hi Paul! We're sorry to hear you are experiencing issues at this time. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/rjnHpzUE0x We will be happy to help you in any way we can. - Charles

@drcheriphillips @Fly_Nashville @drcheriphillips Unfortunately, due to the current circumstances, we've been forced to make some tough decisions including cancelling a number of flights. We're sorry to hear that you were impacted by these cancellations. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM. - C

✔️ 1 takeoff.
✔️ 1 landing.
✔️ 0 stops.
#TogetherWeFly

📷: ny.spotting https://t.co/ydaeE3VLIw

@Viserio37148289 @Viserio37148289 Hi there! All customers are required to wear a face covering over their nose and mouth at all times when traveling to help protect them and those around them. Please send us a DM with your reservation details so that we may investigate this situation. - C

@ericmcclure @ericmcclure Hi Eric! We are very disappointed that we did not provide exemplary service during your recent travel. Please send us a DM so that we can review your flight details and provide you with all options available. -Jenna  https://t.co/bz4sWAkHdV
@EmmiRemi @EmmiRemi That's paws-itively wonderful! Glad to hear your first flight was a success and we hope to welcome you back on board again soon! - SG
@carolinabrags @carolinabrags That's what we love to hear, Carolina! 💙🧡💛 - SG

@fire_tera @fire_tera I'm really sorry to hear about your uncle's situation. At many of our smaller airports, we close the check-in counter 45 minutes prior to departure so our team members can assist at the gate. Please send us a private message if you need assistance. - SG

Don't mind Jude, he's just trying the flight deck on for size. We think it's a perfect fit! #TogetherWeFly

📸: chaeshortie1456 https://t.co/J2AD3LpSYq
@ce985811 @ce985811 This is not what we like to hear. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VZlxgH99Nw if you or your daughter are in need of assistance. - Charles

data.text: @FaithTannerTV @FaithTannerTV Hi there Faith! Allegiant station employees and flight crews are required to wear face masks. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/8JXa7pcwFQ with your reservation details so we may look into this situation. - Charles

@Some_Say_Belvin @Some_Say_Belvin Thanks for sharing this with us Tyler. The safety of our passengers and crew member is our top priority. I would like to assure you that this has been forwarded to the appropriate department for further investigation. - Charles

@KarenS43 @KarenS43 Hi there! We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX. For cancellations, vouchers will be issued in the full amount of the itinerary. If you have further questions, please send us a DM. - Charles

data.text:
It's time for some #TouchDowns. #FootballSeason 🏈✈️

📸: @Raiders https://t.co/E4h6CCCn73

@judyneher @judyneher Hi Judy! Thanks for reaching out. Our representatives are expected to enforce our policies and safety measures to the best of their abilities. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/8JXa7pcwFQ with your reservation details so we can look into this situation. - Charles

@Hive4K @NewYorkStateAG @Hive4K We're so sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. Unfortunately, due to the current circumstances, we've been forced to make some tough decisions including cancelling a number of flights. If you need assistance, please send us a DM with your reservation details. - C
@karislikeparis @karislikeparis We are very sorry to hear of your delayed flight. If you are in need of assistance, send us a DM and we will assist in any way possible. -Jenna https://t.co/NOxwctaF4g
@simplyfamous_7 @simplyfamous_7 Ticket counter hours are open 2 hours prior to each departure. If you have not yet been assisted, please send us a DM. -Jenna https://t.co/oLfe1NtfOS
@mgorges @mgorges So cute! We hope Tucker had an awesome flight. 😍 - Lupe

@BrygetteRenee @BrygetteRenee Hi Renee! We would happy to answer any and all questions you may have. Please feel welcomed to send us a direct message with your question(s). https://t.co/6BsbR872AF - Lupe

@ahrcanum @ahrcanum Hey there! If you need help finding your credit vouchers, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/BSQoGiSgvu with your email address and the specifics of your request. 🙂 - Charles

@stevenplace @stevenplace Hi Steve! If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/X3OamExNU6  with the specifics of your request. We will be happy to help you in any way we can. - Charles
@jesscacaroline @jesscacaroline I'm really sorry to hear about your experience, Jessie. We'll certainly pass this along for review with our appropriate teams. - SG
@chrisv990 @chrisv990 That's positively wonderful to hear! Thanks for the feedback! - SG

data.text: @ruirish01 @TravelPulse @ruirish01 I'm very sorry to hear that happened, Colleen. We will share your photos with our team to address the issue. Thank you for bringing it to our attention! - SG

@LVWELSHMAN @LVWELSHMAN You can check out our health and safety initiatives by visiting our website at https://t.co/hnFsp3MQby. You can also send us a private message any time if you have specific questions! - SG

@ShelbyTucker_25 @ShelbyTucker_25 Hello Shelby! We are sorry to hear of your frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/FLtJ8hYAqy with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. We will be happy to help you in any way we can. - Charles

@melbicsmith @melbicsmith Thanks so much for reaching out to us. We are very disappointed to hear about this. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/dESZm1itOt with your reservation details so that we may look into this situation. - Charles

Before each flight, our captains explain some of the big ways we're putting your health and safety first. But you don't have to wait till you're on board to learn how we're "Going the Distance"--you can visit our website or contact us via phone, email, or private message! https://t.co/rmUPFyBU2u

The view from above is amazing, but the view from below is just as impressive!

📸: centex.spotter https://t.co/CX2AAbnp5p

@julieravs @julieravs I'm sorry to hear that, Julie. While we don't block seats, we do enable you to opt in to be notified if your flight's capacity exceeds 65% so you can make the choice that's best for you if you're concerned about traveling on a fuller flight. - SG
@kalisteele2 @kalisteele2 I'm really sorry to hear about your experience, Kali. Please feel free to send us a private message if you need any assistance from our team. - SG

@jane_jamm @jane_jamm I'm sorry to hear your flight was delayed and for the inconvenience it caused.  We want to get you safely to your destination on time, but we will never sacrifice safety to meet an on-time departure or arrival. Please send us a PM if you need assistance. - SG
@acjflyer @fargoairport @acjflyer Gorgeous, gorgeous shot! - SG
@NerdCaptnHaley @NerdCaptnHaley Enforcement of our mask policy is certainly expected from our flight attendants. I will be sure to share your feedback with our teams. Thank you! - SG
@thetigermily @thetigermily I'm really sorry to hear that. Please feel free to send us a private message if you need any assistance from our team. - SG

@ketariwrites @ketariwrites I'm really sorry to hear that, Ketari. If a flight time is changed, we notify you via an email to the email address you used to book the reservation. Please feel free to send us a private message, and we'd be happy to assist you on this platform. - SG
@terrapinoy @terrapinoy That's what we love, love, love to hear! Enjoy your time in BWI! - SG
Our low-touch service approach limits contact to provide a streamlined customer experience that protects your health and safety! #GoingTheDistance https://t.co/c5s90111oC
@fargoairport @fargoairport We're excited to be back! #TogetherWeFly ✈ - Lupe

data.text: We earned the highest score for COVID-19 traveler safety in a recent ranking of North America's airlines! Safe Travel Barometer conducted the independent audit, evaluating more than 150 airlines. Check out @TravelPulse's article about the study here: https://t.co/FM5AZ2LsAR! https://t.co/hOHK03P7DB
@jrich1997 @jrich1997 Hi Josh! We extend our flight schedule every three to four months. The last extension was in June, so we should be coming up on the next one soon. Keep an eye out! - SG
@SocialBurro @SocialBurro Please send us a private message so one of our team members can assist you! - SG
@MrMrsKaehler @MrMrsKaehler We're just as sad as you are Hannah! 😭 - Lupe
@cassdoll__ @cassdoll__ Hi Cass! All items purchased in-flight can take up to three weeks to post to a passenger’s account as they are run through a third party company. - Lupe

@TexasTech1996 @TexasTech1996 We're sorry for any disappointment. If you would like to secure an entire row to yourself, you are more than welcome to purchase additional tickets to do so. See you in the sky soon! - Lupe
@jka0505 @jka0505 Happy to hear your flight arrived earlier than expected! We hope to see you onboard again real soon! 😎 - Lupe

@SouthsideSavior @SouthsideSavior Thanks for the shout out Cory! We look forward to having the privilege to serve you again in the future! 🙂✈ - Charles
#togetherwefly

data.text: @KristenMeghan @united Hi @KristenMeghan ! We do have a process in place. Those with medical conditions that prevent the use of a face covering must provide documentation from a medical physician to the gate agent one hour prior to departure. To learn more, check out: https://t.co/LjcDH7AqLO - Charles
Would you believe us if we told you this little one's first words were "nonstop flights"? #TheyWerentButTheyCouldBe #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/01uhcZC4WR

@kenne_brown @kenne_brown Hello Kenne! Thanks for reaching out. We are sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance or looking for alternative options, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/19J72Cqm0R We will be happy to help you in any way we can. - Charles

@danie11enic01e @danie11enic01e Hi there! If you do not use the full amount of your credit voucher, the balance will remain on the voucher until you either use it again or it expires. If you have further questions or concerns, please feel free to send us a DM: https://t.co/WfUSy4xIwA - Charles

@mattschapman @mattschapman Hi Matt! We're sorry to hear about this. Please be assured that our crew members will do all that they can to accommodate reasonable requests. However, they must also adhere to safety procedures. If you wish to discuss this further, plz send us a DM. - Charles

We've extended our no-fee change and cancellation policy through Oct. 31, so you can continue to book with confidence! #TogetherWeFly

📸: flytucson https://t.co/KVTKTniyFb
@swkraz @swkraz Hello there! Thanks for reaching out to us. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/0wu8fWcyeB We will gladly help you in any way we can. - Charles
@MyraMiles Hello @MyraMiles ! If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/0MomvuR1mK We will be happy to help you. - Charles

@lmTrying @lmTrying Hello Diane! Thanks for reaching out. Our records indicate that the FLL ticket counter is staffed as of this time. If this is not the case, please send us a DM: https://t.co/jXgIl4QxFc so that we can investigate this situation. - Charles

@sam_0113 @sam_0113 Hello Samantha! We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a delay today. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/gbPVgX35FK with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. We will be happy to help you. - Charles

@BrettRumpSports @BrettRumpSports Hello Brett! At this time, we do not have plans to offer a route between FWA and FLL or West Palm. However, we are a rapidly growing company and always considering new routes to service. I can forward this suggestion over to our forecasting department. - Charles

@TylerMcCaffrey1 @TylerMcCaffrey1 Hey Tyler! We are sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/dqbP8xTE97 with your reservation details and the specifics of your request. We will be happy to help you. - Charles
Keeping you in the know about our aircraft's airflow. #GoingTheDistance https://t.co/SA1hmVmoJk
@Jack_OMalleyIII @Jack_OMalleyIII I'm sorry to hear that. Please feel free to send us a private message if there's anything our team can assist you with. - SG
@TylerCoolGuy88 @TylerCoolGuy88 Very cool shot!

@lukecatlin @FlyICT @gatewayairport @lukecatlin Hi Luke--I'm happy to let you know that we have continuous service scheduled between Wichita and Phoenix-Mesa through the end of our published schedule (Feb. 8, 2021)! I hope we'll see you on board soon! - SG
We're proud to introduce seven new routes to our all-nonstop network! Service begins in November. #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/XIBwKyI6Qz
